name: Wacky Spores: The Chase
description: Wacky Spores: The Chase is a colorful RPG runner which combines the strategy of turn-based battles with the taste of directly aiming your shots in an endless runner style.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX260 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible sound card
